snippet.title: Mama & Son - Clean House (September 13, 2010)
snippet.description:
Official description: Really Shooter and his mother Poor Mama are running a cleaning service business, with Really taking commando jobs on the side. One day, aliens invade (!) and Really doesn’t hesitate for one second, he heads over to their mother ship and begins to mow down the invading forces with his trusty machine-gun. And of course, as usual it is up to Mama to clean up the mess after him.

Developer:
Ludosity Interactive
Genre:
Action & Adventure
Release Date:
September 13, 2010

Features:
Custom SoundTracks
HDTV 720p
Players Co-op: 2
Players: 1 - 2
